entry.source: My youngest child, {F804,5}Priyankara,{F804,0} has been{F801}kidnapped! I wonder if Buddha hid him from{F801}me because he is angry at me? But I don't{F801}eat humans any more... Please, help me find{F801}my baby! Meet me at {F804,5}Kishimojin Temple,{F804,0} which{F801}is {F804,5}south of Ikebukuro.{F804,0} I'll tell you more.{F801}
